title: Trump Misstates Facts in State of the Union Regarding Charlotte Murder
summary: Trump incorrectly linked a Charlotte murder to open borders. The suspect was a U.S. citizen.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the spread of misinformation and its potential impact on immigration debates.

title: Hayward: Major Employer in Clemmons, NC

title: Florence Airport Passenger Numbers Rise Despite Loss of Charlotte Flight
